## ClipmapTerrain.(constructor)

Creates a new clipmap terrain instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(scene: Scene, sizeX?: number, sizeZ?: number, clipMapTileSize?: number);
```

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

</td></tr>

sizeZ


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Terrain depth in world units (default: 256)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

clipMapTileSize


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Size of each clipmap tile in vertices (default: 64) Larger values use more memory but reduce draw calls


</td></tr>
